name: Apocalypse: Zombie Run
description:
The Zombie Apocalypse is apon us! 

Unfortunately, The US Government will take about a week to reach your location. Play as a group of 11 allies working together to survive the week! Be careful, traps are everywhere!  If any of your allies die, they will come back as zombies the next day! Be careful re-tracing your steps!

Play through 3 unique locations:
Test your platforming skills in The Great Planes
Find your way through the maze-like skylines in City Grounds
Watch your step in the deadly factory that is Pop Co.

You can also send other allies to scavenge for food on their own! You don't need to find food for those chosen, however they are not guarinteed survival!

How long can you keep everyone alive?

-Game by Wowasaur and Spiral Team-
